regex.name: getUrl
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re , requests def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): url='http://diskokosmiko.mx/maxxcn/mizine-48961/list,1,1' headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0 Iceweasel/42.0', 'Referer': ''} r = requests.get(url, headers=headers).text vfile , vtoken = re.findall('action/DownloadFile.*?fileId.*?value="(.*?)".*?Token".*?value="(.*?)"', r)[0] #print data_a ref = url headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0 Iceweasel/42.0', 'Referer': ref,'X-Requested-With': 'XMLHttpRequest'} data_a ={'fileId': vfile , '__RequestVerificationToken': vtoken} nr = requests.post('http://diskokosmiko.mx/action/DownloadFile?location=fi&f=48961', headers=headers, data=data_a).text movie = re.findall('DownloadUrl":"(.*?)"', nr)[0] print movie return movie

item.title: [ [COLOR deeppink]MGCK[/COLOR][COLOR yellow]PI[/COLOR] ][COLOR lime] Dragon Ball ( Saga Magic Bu)[/COLOR]

regex.name: getUrl
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re , requests def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): url='http://diskokosmiko.mx/Animegoku18/dragon-ball-z-saga-de-majin-buu' headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0 Iceweasel/42.0', 'Referer': ''} r = requests.get(url, headers=headers).text vfile , vtoken = re.findall('action/DownloadFile.*?fileId.*?value="(.*?)".*?Token".*?value="(.*?)"', r)[0] #print data_a ref = url headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0 Iceweasel/42.0', 'Referer': ref,'X-Requested-With': 'XMLHttpRequest'} data_a ={'fileId': vfile , '__RequestVerificationToken': vtoken} nr = requests.post('http://diskokosmiko.mx/action/DownloadFile?location=fi&', headers=headers, data=data_a).text movie = re.findall('DownloadUrl":"(.*?)"', nr)[0] print movie return movie
